name: Mars probe
description:
Game built for GMTK Jam 2020 in 48h

A Plattformer but without direct control of the character. Instead you program and upload movement patterns to a robot.

Play the windows version if you want to enlarge the game-screen. 
Play on the web for easy access, but smaller game-screen

If you play the web-version and the scaling is not pixel perfect, make sure the zoom in the browser is 100% and desktop scaling to 100% (on Windows 10), which should be 96 DPI for other platforms.

Music by Kevin MacLeod
